::Killfest::

Killfest grabs Speedbreaker as he flies by, stopping his ascend. The 
flames didn't do much to Killfest's armor. Seeing the pit edge 
approaching, Killfest flies toward it.

"You allright?" he asks Speedbreaker.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Speedbreaker, now relieved of his rider, transforms, and stops his 
decent
> into the pit, quikly swinging around the bomb Angel Prime launched 
at them,
> as he rises into the air. The bomb detonates in the abiss 
(Prodigey, im not
> sure if you wanted to say it detonates, so tell me, and this post 
will be
> invalid) and the flames lick at Speedbreaker's body, the force of 
the
> explosion sending him upwards, and lighting him on fire. "No no no" 
He
> shouts as he gains enough altitude, and grabs for Killfest, 
noticing the
> jetpacks dwindeling fuel.
